frenz.. (a)ccepts u as wad u are~ (b)elieves in "u"~ (c)alls u juz to say "hi"~ (d)oesnt gif up on u~ (e)nvisions the whole of u~ (f)orgives ur mistakes~ (g)ives unconditionally~ (h)elps u~ (i)nvites u over~ (j)uz "be" with u~ (k)ipz u close at heart~ (l)oves u for who u are~ (m)akes a difference in ur life~ (n)ever judges~ (o)ffers support~ (p)icks u up~ (q)uiets ur fears~ (R)aises ur spirits~ (s)ays nice thingz abt u~ (t)ells u the truth (u)nderstands u~ (V)alues u~ (w)alks beside u~ (X)plain thingz u dun understand~ (y)ells when u wun listen and (z)aps u back to reality~

ppl are just changingg..no one remains de same all de time..but..why mux ppl change to becum worse...arent ppl supposed to change 4 de betta? -dun get it- is de bimbotic/act big character de IN thing now? *shakes head* -dun get it- jux dun get it...why cant ppl jux b themselves...why act? warning: BE YOURSELF.

The journey of ma' life is meaningful. You, had became a chapter in it. No doubt how great you are. Thanks. I love you. -Think positively.If there's a rock infront of u, its either to build a bridge or a wall. I can make it tru'. -possible.to.create.miracle-

-FRIENDS. Someone who says good things about u behind ur' back. Someone who help u without u knowing it. Someone who truely adore u. Someone who is there to give u a hug. Someone who is there keeping quiet to listen to you. Someone who is there at the bottom to get u when u'r falling. Someone who is there to encourage u to keep on moving. Someone who is there knowin your feeling without saying. Someone who is there for u.

Where i end up isn't the most important thing. It's the road i take to get there. The road i take is what i'll look back on and call ma' life. Fear less, hope more. Eat less, chew more. Whine less, breathe more. Talk less, say more. Hate less, love more . . . And all good things are yours. Learn to adapt.Learn to give. Learn to forget.Learn to sacrifise. Man are.. ignorant.Time.. give man to do things. Wealth.. give man to get things. In life-what do you hope for.?what do you aim for.? Create your life with both hands.A glass with a crack is still as prefect to me.
